abstrac: Helping food entrepreneurs feed their businesses with a tantalizing menu of experience and support.
bio:
Jody Birnbaum, the President and founder of Caterconsult, Inc. is herself a "survivor" of 25 plus years as a catering business owner.  As a fellow entrepreneur with a shared sense of risk and adventure, she knows how challenging it can be to keep a business strong and healthy for the long run.

Caterconsult, Inc. provides affordable business management and consulting services to the foodservice industry.  We help business owners operate more efficiently and profitably by providing core strategies, methods, resources, training and support.

No one said it was going to be easy being an entrepreneur but we've found that the opportunity to share and exchange information with those who have "been there and done that" can be extremely validating and empowering.

Collaborative effort, brainstorming, experience and tools of the trade are powerful allies when combined with your own gut instincts about your business.

Please feel free to inquire via phone, text, email or smoke signal!  We're available and would love to hear from you.  Our fees are based either hourly or per project and we accept payment via check or paypal.

description.title: Photography Services
description: I am a passionate photographer that is eager and willing to photographs your assignments with excellence and high quality photographs.

abstrac: A Passionate Photographer who loves to create beauty in every shot.
bio: My name is Candace Woods and I love to take pictures. I went to school for photography at The Art Institute in Atlanta for a short time before I left school to serve my country. After returning from the Army, I never returned to Art school instead pursued a degree in the medical field. I have always wanted to finish what I started and decided to go back to Photography as a hobby. I missed taking pictures so much that I self-taught myself how to reuse the camera again by taking online classes and getting behind the lens. I'm so passionate about photography and expressing the beauty that I see everyday through the lens.
Part-time, short terms assignments

bio:
I have owned E-Secretarial Services, a virtual assisting company, for almost 6 years. As a VA I simplify business entrepreneurs and small business owner’s lives. Learning something new every day is the greatest joy I get from my business.

Since opening E-Secretarial Services in July of 2009 I have loved every minute of being a VA.  I like my clients to think of me as their beck and call girl so that they can manage their time better and make their business run smoother.  I also make detail and time management a priority so that work is completed in a timely fashion.

If you are ready to make the time you spend on your business mean more and get rid of the items on your to do list that are weighing you down then I’m the VA for you.
All work payment terms and hours of available are determined at the time of proposal acceptance. Please feel free to contact me with any questions you may have.

abstrac: Expert Virtual Assistant - Administrative Assistant - Task Manager
bio:
It's always difficult to describe yourself. I wear a lot of hats and love it that way. I'm a mother of 2, a grandmother of one, a wife, a cat care taker, an artisan, a lover of all things old and unique. My background includes stints as an event planner, a medical office administrator, and a host of other jobs that each, in some way, led me to what I do now. That said I absolutely LOVE the journey I am on, especially the opportunity to work virtually on a daily basis.  

Profile
A dedicated, seasoned professional with 15+ years of clerical, office administrative experience strong analytical and organizational skills with demonstrated ability to plan workload, and scale operations to align with business priorities who is comfortable with difficult mandates and tight deadlines; at ease in cross functional environments able to self-manage and exercise good judgment or contribute on a team level across a variety of business settings.   

Knowledge, Skills and Abilities
Research – Conceptualization – Implementation – Communication Written and Oral – Office Technologies Sales / Service Processes – Office / Business Etiquette – Practical – Sociable – Optimistic – Type 60 WPM

Ideally I would prefer to work Monday thru Friday 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. Eastern Standard time - however, I am available to work other hours as needed as well as weekends as needed.  My payment terms for one-off projects are to be paid at the end of the project, for ongoing projects payment would be expected on a weekly basis as per the total weekly hours agreed upon.

abstrac: Online Marketing and Responsive Website & Mobile Application (Native & HTML5)Development solutions
bio:
Business On Top is one of the leading providers of Online Marketing and Website Development solutions. Since its inception, we have focused our efforts in helping small and medium sized businesses stay ahead of the competition by providing them with solutions that work and are up to date with the latest technology and trends. Our web solutions and online marketing strategies are both creative and intuitive to meet the end customer’s need, which in turn helps us to provide our clients with higher returns on their investments. Keeping pace with day-to-day changes in online marketing strategies and web technologies can be an overwhelming task. Search Engine algorithms, technology and optimization tactics require continuous updates. 

Business On Top's team of extremely knowledgeable and talented professionals are masters at providing solutions that are designed to fit your unique business need. Our expert’s work with you to leave no stone unturned in conceptualizing the apt ROI-centric web development and internet marketing strategy to fuel your Business in the Online world and run an effective Online Marketing campaign. Business On Top customer support center is always available for its clients to provide assistance and guidance in this vast and competitive digital arena. We are one of the leading names in the industry; known for our solutions centric approach to our client’s needs.
